testcase.name: VIR-226.01 Verify that the dropdown list with contracts is shown in the header
VIR-226.02 Verify that the default contract is selected automatically if no other contract is selected
VIR-226.03 Verify that each customer has their own default contract
VIR-226.04 Verify that the assigned to the shopper contracts (defined at the Ship To level) are shown in the list
VIR-226.05 Verify that shopper can change the contract as many times, as they want
VIR-226.06 Verify that if the shopper changed the contract, the prices and product list are updated accordingly to the selected contract
VIR-226.07 Verify that if the contract is changed in customer master, it is changed to the customer without any notification
VIR-226.08 Verify that the prices shows n/a, if the contract expired and the new one is not selected by shopper
VIR-226.01A Verify that the script switch the contract A to the contract B automatically for bunch of selected customers
